name: ThrillistDestinationGuideNewOrleans
0:
”Alexa, open Thrillist New Orleans”
”Alexa, ask Thrillist New Orleans what the best bars are”
”Alexa, ask Thrillist New Orleans about Mardi Gras”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: thrillist new orleans
des:
When going on a trip, fear of missing out can be a big cause of anxiety. Don’t spend hours reading and searching online — we've got your back. 

Thrillist’s New Orleans destination guide for Alexa can help you with essential travel tips and recommendations from close to a dozen locals. You can ask about things like the best restaurants in New Orleans, must eats, best bars, where to stay, tips for visitors, getting around, activities, where to stay, and Mardi Gras.

Trust us to help you get the most out of your trip. Just ask Alexa to open Thrillist New Orleans.

When the skill prompts you for any reply, you can say these following things:

“Next” — Say “next” to hear more in the same section. 

“Menu” — Say “menu” to hear the sections of this guide that you can jump to. Your choices are: best restaurants in New Orleans, must eats, best bars, where to stay, tips for visitors, getting around, activities, where to stay, and Mardi Gras.

[section title] — You can say any of the section titles listed under the menu options.

“Help” — Say “help” to hear your options within the app.

“I’m done” — Say “I’m done” to hear the exit text.

“Skip” — Say “skip” to skip to the next section of the guide.

To view a written version of the Thrillist Destination Guide for New Orleans, go to https://www.thrillist.com/alexa in your web browser.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
